subject: Golf
Solheim Cup (Golf)
Davis Cup
lead_paragraph: Of all the Solheim Cup parents, nobody has more wisdom to impart than Jessica Korda’s father, Petr Korda, who compiled a 29-13 record in Davis Cup competition.
snippet: Of all the Solheim Cup parents, nobody has more wisdom to impart than Jessica Korda’s father, Petr Korda, who compiled a 29-13 record in Davis Cup competition.
